page.title: 01DAGENHAM IN BRIEF
page.content: Dagenham is situated to the east of London, and is part of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham. It has a large number of primary and secondary schools,many large parks and a swimming pool. There are also indoor and outdoor facilities for a wide range of sports.There is a new but small shopping centre at the Heathway called the Mall, which is an indoor centre. To buy clothes or large items however most people in Dagenham go into nearby Romford. Dagenham is on the whole, an industrial area. the main industries of Dagenham are the Fords motor company ahd May and Baker, a chemical plant Dagenham used to be a rural village and the old church and Cross Keys pub are evidence of this.
